classes.title: Introduction to Website Development
classes.description:
Tackle front-end development head on with this simple introduction to web design.

  • Use graphics programs and create animations.
  • Learn to use HTML and CSS.
  • Embed and share your creations via social networking sites such as YouTube, Twitter and Facebook.
No prior experience is necessary.

classes.title: Progressive Web Apps
classes.description:
A new revolution on the web today. In this course we’ll create a social chatting web application with a responsive layout, that works offline and can be can be installed on the home screen of mobile devices.

We’ll use about Polymer as the backbone of our application; create a login system using Google OAuth and use Firebase to hosting the application and store any data we need.

Here is an excellent article Progressive Apps: Escaping Tabs Without Losing Our Soul by Alex Russell
